ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Powerleveling Others
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Worked for me about a week ago. Was travelling through, saw a solo er in trouble fighting 2 mobs, hacked the extra down to less than a bubble, charmed it
ygData.messageBody:
At 12:22 PM 2/7/01 -0600, Daniel P. Sniderman wrote:
>Has the Mem Blur component been ┬ônerfed┬ö? I tried Power leveling someone
>the other night while camping Gate Potions in Cazic Thule. Fought it down
>to next to nothing ┬¡ charmed it ┬¡ and when Charm Broke ┬¡ the 20┬Æish Druid
>killed it but didn┬Æt get the XP. I thought that was ┬ôthe Program┬ö.
>
>Thanks
>
>Slyde
>Level 53

Worked for me about a week ago. Was travelling through, saw a solo'er in
trouble fighting 2 mobs, hacked the extra down to less than a bubble,
charmed it and had him kill it and he got the exp.

---Windleaf
